name: OR_CASE_SCHED_HIST
description: The OR_CASE_SCHED_HIST table contains OR management system case scheduling history.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the OR scheduling history information.

columns.name: MATCH_SRVC_BLOCK_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the matching service block ID of the schedule instance if the match type is a service block.
